Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.i18n

This package contains description of Pure Library internationalization classes. This internalization is based on the standard Java internationalization mechanism (see ResourceBundle Java class) with additional functionality. This functionality includes:

  • support Localizer mechanism with any localization content sources (see chav1961.purelib.fsys)
  • support Localization listeners (see LocaleChangeListener interface)
  • support nested and sibling Localizers with automatic localization key overlapping

All the classes in the package are thread-safe

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractLocalizer.SupportedLocalesIterator
    Yhjis interface is used to enumerate all locales supported
    LocalizerFactory.FillLocalizedContentCallback<T>
    This lambda-styled interface describes callback for storing localized data thru LocaleSpecificTextSetter interface.
    LocalizerFactory.PostProcessCallback<T>
    This lambda-styled interface describes callback for special processing of the data localized before assign the value to any target (for example, make automatic upper case for localization strings).
    MutableJsonLocalizer.LocalizerTableModel  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLocalizer
    This is an abstract class to implements any localizers.
    DebuggingLocalizer
    This class is a special implementation to use in the JUnit tests only.
    DummyLocalizer
    This class is a special implementation of localizer to use in non-multilanguaged applications.
    FileSystemLocalizer
    This class is a file-system-based implementation of the Localizer.
    LocaleSpecificTextWrapper<T extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    This utility class can be used as container for some swing objects to support automatic localization for them.
    LocalizerFactory
    This class contains a set of static methods to manipulate with the localizers.
    MutableJsonLocalizer
    This class is a mutable collection of key/value pairs for different languages.
    PropertiesLocalizer
    This class is a wrapper to standard Java ResourceBundle class.
    PureLibLocalizer
    This class is an own localizer for the Pure Library components.
    WellKnownLocalizationKeys  
    XMLLocalizer
